name: rapidapply-resumebuilder
description: A modern, fast, and intuitive resume builder built with Next.js 16, React 19, and Tailwind CSS 4. Create professional resumes in minutes with AI-powered assistance, real-time preview, and multiple export options.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
